I remember a ram expansion being tentatively offered that was nowhere near =
$500. What am I missing here? Sorry if I am coming off as confrontational, =
but I really do not know what this inquiry is about. AFAIK, no one here was=
 selling anything for $500 in recent memory.=C2=A0

      From: "Chuck Zell=
ers chuckzellers@... [ballyalley]" <ballyalley@yahoogroups.com>
 To: =
"ballyalley@yahoogroups.com" <ballyalley@yahoogroups.com>; "ballyalley@yaho=
ogroups.com" <ballyalley@yahoogroups.com> 
 Sent: Wednesday, December 7, 20=
16 10:41 PM
 Subject: Re: [ballyalley] Hardware
   
=C2=A0   In June of thi=
s year I replied to a post regarding a hardware expansion. I sent $500 with=
 the understanding the device would be available shortly after assembly. In=
 October I enquired what the status and was assured it was being completed.=
 After several inquiries that were not answered I decided to (without menti=
oning a name) make others aware. At this point I don't expect either the ha=
rdware nor my $500. Just my experience.
Sent from Yahoo Mail on Android 
 
=
  =C2=A0   Yeah agreed, what happened? =C2=A0
You cant just toss an accusat=
ion like that out there on an established group like this without the whole=
 story Chuck.
-Michael=C2=A0

Sent from Yahoo Mail on Android 
 
  =C2=A0  =
 What happened?
